    SplineInterpolator  
    sRgb65ColorSpace  
    sRgbUtil
    This is a utility class with static methods for gamma correction used by LabColorSpace and LuvColorSpace color spaces.
    Statistics  
    Statistics
    Utility class defines a few statistical methods.
    SubpixelMaxInterpolator
    The common interface for all sub-pixel locator classes.
    SubpixelMaxInterpolator.Method
    Enumeration of keys for SubpixelMaxInterpolator methods.
    SubpixelMaxInterpolator.QuadraticLeastSquares
    2D interpolator based on least-squares fitting a quadratic polynomial
    SubpixelMaxInterpolator.QuadraticTaylor
    2D interpolator using second-order Taylor expansion to find the coefficients of the quadratic interpolating polynomial
    SubpixelMaxInterpolator.Quartic
    2D interpolator based on fitting a 'quartic' (i.e., 4th-order) polynomial
    f(x,y) = c_0 + c_1 x + c_2 y + c_3 x^2 + c_4 y^2 + c_5 x y + c_6 x^2 y + c_7 x y^2 + c_8 x^2 y^2
    to the supplied sample values.
    TestImagesFetchFromGitHub Deprecated.

    Represents a 2D triangle, specified by three corner points.
